data.text: @LouHugh94144201 Hola Lou. We have replied to your DM. Regards.
@kerryktroup Hola Kerry. We have replied to your DM. Regards.
@merceds_vidal Hola Mercedes, indícanos mas detalles acerca de lo sucedido por mensaje directo https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 para que podamos revisar internamente. Saludos.

@danielwales07 Hola Daniel, we are truly sorry to read about that. Could you please, send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with any detail you could consider important so that we could review your case? We remain at your disposal. Regards.
@FowlerCarmona Hola. Did you purchase your tickets through https://t.co/wCD0fEwHFh or through BA? Regards.

data.text: @GoutasTamara Hola Tamara, envíanos los datos por MD y te sugerimos eliminar este comentario ya que contiene información personal. Saludos.
@MaeveScott12 Hola Maeve, sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your claim reference number and full name https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@slalani We're terribly sorry. Due to the high volume of requests, our colleagues are taking longer than usual to respond. We appreciate your patience. Best regards
@tvrtastic Hola, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience. We've just sent you a DM with instructions on how to claim compensation. Please check
@kadielicious Hola Kadie, sorry to read this. Could you please send us a DM with more details on what the baggage center agent told you today? https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Davewharton1001 Hola David, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Designertravel4 full name and more details about your query https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@Designertravel4 Hola, we're sorry to read this. Could you please confirm if at the airport you contacted the airline that operated the last flight in your itinerary? Have you received a piece of paper after that? Please send us a DM with your /1
@Svetosl02460691 Hola, please send us the booking code and your last name by DM to check if that appears in our system. Thank you.
@CMonchique Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. We'll contact the relevant department once again, as we still haven't received an update about your refund. Apologies
@Svetosl02460691 Hola Svetoslav, please contact with E dreams as they are the ones to give you the available options. Regards.

Panama: volcanic islands, tropical rainforests, humpback whales... From June to December is the perfect time to escape to this unexplored paradise. Enjoy the beauty spots and these places we’ve selected for you. Discover them in Iberia Plus magazine 👉 https://t.co/LG4otQxvo7 https://t.co/PQRas86cJN

urls.title: Panama’s top spots: eight paradises to visit on your travels | Iberia Plus
urls.description: In this gallery, we explore Panama and its lush nature, culture, traditions and unique geography, which connects Central and South America and the Atlantic with the Pacific and the Caribbean

data.text: @trulo910 Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your Iberia booking code, full name and ticket number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@TanyaKh48700934 Hola Tanya, we've replied your DMs. Please check
@fondo_bet Hola, we replied to your DM. Regards.

@alawiwsm09 Hola Ali, when accessing https://t.co/McKyXP7Yxx using a laptop or desktop computer, you should be able to login by clicking on the option ''login'' on the footer of the page. When accessing via mobile, you need to click on the menu (top right of the screen) and then on ''login''

urls.title: Iberia's platform to recover your lost belongings
urls.description: Everything lost can be found. Foundspot is a free service connecting people who have lost items or pets with the people who have found it.

data.text: @cheunghk5 We will reply to it. Regards.
@trulo910 Hola Mary, Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number and full contact details. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@LouHugh94144201 Hola Lou, our team requested to send it to your permanent address, you´ll be contacted soon. Regards.
@raulromanadra Hola, hemos pedido al área responsable que te contacte para que puedan asistirte. Saludos
@raulromanadra Hola, te hemos enviado un MD. Saludos
@Yeliz30170546 You're welcome :)
@raulromanadra Sentimos las molestias y agradecemos tu paciencia. ya hemos respondido al MD que nos enviaste. Estaremos atentos a cualquier duda adicional. Saludos.

@Yeliz30170546 Yel, as we told you before, our colleagues are analyzing your case again, as soon as they have an answer, they will contact you by email, we really appreciate your patience. KInd regards
@7ananz_ Hola Hana, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your PIR code and full passenger name to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Yeliz30170546 Hola, we have replied your DM. Regards

@raulromanadra Hola. Gracias por tu respuesta. Por favor envíanos el código de reserva y el nombre completo asociado a través de un mensaje directo. De igual manera te sugerimos eliminar tu comentario anterior, ya que expone de manera pública tu información personal. Saludos.

@TanyaKh48700934 Hola Tanya, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM, since the flight was operated by BA, you should contact them directly to request for the proof of no traveled. Kind regards
@diiijaaaaa We have also replied your DM. Regards
@diiijaaaaa Hola Diijaa, we are sorry to read this, please give us by DM all details of your baggage claim and PIR code and full passenger name to verify the information. Thanks in advance
@rg8641 Hola. Sentimos las molestias. Si podemos ayudar en algo desde aquí, por favor déjanos saber. Saludos.

@raulromanadra Hola Raul. ¿Cuándo has hecho la compra del billete? ¿has comprado desde https://t.co/8ZwK4oBDig? ¿nos podrías proporcionar una captura de pantalla con el error junto con los datos de la reserva por mensaje directo, por favor?
Gracias y saludos.

data.text: @SVmom1 Hola Dorrie, we answered to your direct message, we kindly ask you to keep the conversation on that channel, in order to have all the details in the same chat. Kind regards.

@PC53725937 Hola. You'd be able to consult directly with our luggage centre to the available lines https://t.co/H2dXd5CH3J our colleagues will review your information and inform you on how to proceed. Kind regards.

@MikeBalder Hello Mike. If you have submitted the information, our colleagues should answer you in the upcoming days to your email adress. If you don't have an answer in the next 7 days (business) please let us know. 
Kind regards.

@PC53725937 Hola. Unfortunately, the search for your luggage is still on going. We are unable to speed up the process from this channel. Once your luggage is located you will receive an SMS / Email. Sorry for any inconvenience. Kind regards.
@jasonkaldani Hola Jason. We have answered your direct message. Kind regards,

@MikeBalder Hello Mike. Regarding your case, we understand that our colleagues sent you an email recently on August 12 asking you for information, information that to this date, you have not submitted. Did you check your spam folders as well? Please let us know. 
Kind regards,

@kadielicious Hola. We are sorry to read about this. To confirm, have you not received any SMS / Email about your incidence? When was the last time you contacted with our luggage centre? Could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa ? Thank you .
@tinabgibby Hola Tina, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your full name, account number and email address https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@LouHugh94144201 Hola Lou, sorry to read this. Due to the high volume of calls, our colleagues are taking longer than usual to pick up. Please try again in a few hours
@vickdiesel1 Sorry for the delay, Vick. We'll get back to you as soon as we have an update from the relevant department. Kind regards

@alawiwsm09 Sorry, Ali. We're not asking you to complete the form once again. We just said that you can follow up the searches through the foundspot website. There you can check if there's an update from the lost and found team. Unfortunately, as we can see, there isn't
@alawiwsm09 Unfortunately, it's not possible to contact our colleagues by phone. In order to follow up the case, you need to complete the login at https://t.co/t4M8dD8ppq

data.text: @alawiwsm09 Hola Ali, sorry to read this. As soon as the lost and found team has any news about your phone, you'll be contact by email. In order to follow the searches, please access  https://t.co/t4M8dD8ppq . Kind regards

data.text: @gregblenkspt Hola Greg. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@LouHugh94144201 @BriDeehan Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name and PIR reference number. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@AndyJBatt You're welcome, Andy
@kiithic You're welcome :)
@Chiwilla Hola, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and have just replied your DMs. Best regards
@AndyJBatt We'll contact the relevant department and keep you posted via DM. Kind regards

@AndyJBatt Hola Andy, is your new query related to the tickets that you sent us yesterday? If so, unfortunately, we couldn't locate any checked bags included in your booking. In case this is about a different booking, please send us a DM with its details https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@sarahlaclau Our team will be contacting you to check the details of the delivery once they confirm the finding,. Regards.
@sarahlaclau With the same claim number our colleagues will contact you to proceed with it. Regards.

@sarahlaclau We'll inform our colleagues that you want to initiate the compensation process due to the fact that you haven't received the bag after 21 days of searches. Please wait for our colleagues' email
@sarahlaclau Hola Sarah, we asked to out team an update for your case E20220727-26969801, unfortunately we still tracking the luggage, we will contact you as soon as we have any updartes.

@sarahlaclau Hola Sarah, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience. Unfortunately, the bag still hasn't been located. You'll be contacted via SMS or email by our baggage center as soon as they have any info about your bag. Apologies
@kiithic Hola, we've replied your DM. Please check
@TanyaKh48700934 Hola Tanya, we've replied your DMs. Best regards
@BMTurner88 Hola, unfortunately, we only offer this service on flights that depart from Madrid (Barajas Airport). Kind regards
@alis_emilia Hola Emilia, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience and have just replied your DMs. Best regards
@CosmopolitanBel Belinda, we have replied your DM. Regards
@CosmopolitanBel Hola Belinda, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM with all details, please continue through that channel. Regards
@CosmopolitanBel Hola Belinda, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us your claim case by DM in order to verify the information?  Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@Quynh_CA8 Hola, yes, for basic you have only 1 carry and 1 personal accesorry that must be under the seat, you can verify all baggage details through this link: https://t.co/fjV78rCevl . Kind regards

data.text: @kerryktroup Hola Kerry, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM  your PIR code and full passenger name to verify the information ? Thankss in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@daskomp Hola Alex, we have replied to your DMs. Kind regards.

@kjrst9 Hola Kristin, flight prices are always depend on availability and demand, you can visit our website https://t.co/rVRoIkVZso to look for the best prices available for your desired route. Kind regards.

data.text: @CoachCourtnay Hola Courtnay, we are very sorry to read this. Did you report this incident with your bag at the airport? Please send us a DM with the details so we can have a look. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@AndyJBatt Andy, we've sent you a DM with more details on this issue, please check our message. Kind regards.

@castletwitty Hola, unfortunately we don't have details on this incident from this channel, we suggest you to consult directly with the airport personnel or your flights' crew for more information on this. Kind regards.
@pan_y_cafe_ Hola, please send us a DM with the details of your booking so we can assist you. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@rickeard Hola Oliver, we haven't received any DMs from you, please send us all the details of your case so we can have a look. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@cheunghk5 Hola Cheung, we have replied to your DMs. Kind regards.

@AndyJBatt We have revised Andy, and in our system we don't see that bag, it shows us that you don't have bag allowance. In this case, since your tickets were issued by an intermediary, you must revise all the details directly with them, we couldn't tell you anything different. Regards.
@vickdiesel1 We have requested you more information via DM Vick, please check our message.

@fccbrese @IberiaAirRBLX Hola Frank, we are very sorry to read this. You can issue a claim through our website https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG so that the corresponding department can verify your case and compensate you for this. Kind regards.

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @Shannon56598479 Hola Shannon, we are very sorry to read this. Did you issue a claim? Please send us a DM with the details of your request so we can have a look. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@vickdiesel1 We've sent you a DM Vick, please read our message.

@LouHugh94144201 Hola Lou, we have requested updates on your case but unfortunately we haven't had a reply yet, we'll let you know as soon as we have more details on your case. Apologies for the inconveniences.
@vickdiesel1 Hola Vick, we have replied to your DMs. Kind regards.
@AndyJBatt Hola Andy, please send us the details of your booking via DM so we can verify this. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@AndyJBatt Hello Andy, please contact directly with Vueling to check the details of your case. Regards.
